name: Bestiary
description:
Shift + Right Click a monster while in combat to open an overlay detailing their attack patterns. Right click again to close this overlay. You can disable requiring shift in the Main Menu -> Mods -> Bestiary -> Config menu.

Please report any bugs you find by leaving a comment on the Workshop page or creating an issue on the Github page. Thanks!
credits: Special thanks to ForgottenArbiter and the Spire Reference spreadsheet, which managed to cut down the information gathering to a mere 12 hours instead of being many more.
